name: Notion Monthly Planner
description: Make Every Month Count Like A Prowith Notion Monthly Planner!Make the most of your time and stay focused on what matters!Are you struggling to stay organized and motivated?If you are either someone…Who forgets what happened the previous month?Who feels that you are not making any progress?Who doesn't have a simple way to track your progress?You are not alone. We understand!We’ve experienced the same struggles and obstacles.That’s why we’ve created the Notion Monthly Planner!What you'll get:Goals
features: Who forgets what happened the previous month?; Who feels that you are not making any progress?; Who doesn't have a simple way to track your progress?; Goals and WinsBe motivated while you celebrate your wins and achievements; ReflectionsSections like "What when well?" or "What did you learn?"Will keep you accountable for what you want to achieve.; All in one CalendarUnified calendar for your events, meetings, habits
